name: @drifters/nativescript-notification
description: nativescript plugin to handle fcm notification

scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link @drifters/nativescript-notification && npm install @drifters/nativescript-notification ../src -S && cd ../src
scripts.plugin.ng.link: npm link && cd ../demoAngular && npm link @drifters/nativescript-notification && npm install @drifters/nativescript-notification ../src -S && cd ../src
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demoAngular && tns run android --syncAllFiles

author: suminksudhi
